General.Name: Attica Bank S.A.
General.Description: Attica Bank S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Greece. The company operates through Retail Banking, Corporate Banking, and Capital Management/Treasury segments. It offers saving, current, payroll, and pension accounts; time and sight deposit accounts; and repos, sight, and tiered interest rate sight interest-bearing accounts. The company also provides consumer, mortgage, ECO consumer, business premises, long-term, and short-term loans. Its offers home, car, life, and investment insurance products, as well as business insurance products which include large, small, and medium business insurance; and professional civil liability and civil liability business insurance. In addition, the company offers credit, debit, and prepaid cards; letters of guarantee; POS terminals; domestic factoring; and mutual funds, portfolio management, consulting, leasing, cash management, and treasury services, as well as foreign exchange transactions. The company was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece. Attica Bank S.A. operates as a subsidiary of The Hellenic Financial Stability Fund.
